Name: Indian Sunset
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker.
Review: Mango, ginger and cardamom are all classic Indian flavours, here laced with vodka and a splash of lime juice.
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly with David Furnish for Elton John's 'Character & Cocktails'.
